heading: Is Rice Vinegar gluten free?
intro: Use this guide as a quick reference when you're deciding whether Rice Vinegar is safe for a gluten-free lifestyle.

verdict.summary: Rice Vinegar can be gluten-free when prepared without gluten ingredients and cross-contact.

disclaimer: This guidance is informational only. Always verify ingredients and preparation with the restaurant.

sections.title: Quick answer
sections.body: Rice Vinegar can be gluten-free depending on the recipe and preparation. Always check ingredients and ask about cross-contact.

sections.title: Common gluten risks
sections.body: Watch for hidden sources like malt flavoring, soy sauce, or shared fryers. These are frequent sources of cross-contact.

faq.question: Can BiteRight confirm if Rice Vinegar is gluten free?
faq.answer: BiteRight highlights likely gluten risks based on ingredients and preparation. Always confirm with the kitchen if you have coeliac disease.

faq.question: What should I ask a restaurant?
faq.answer: Ask about shared equipment, sauces, marinades, and whether the kitchen has a dedicated gluten-free prep area.
